data.actual_result: It covers a part of the file icon.
data.expected_result: The file name should show up without covering the file icon.
data.short_description: If a file name is too long it goes out of the designated area and hides a part of the file icon when trying to delete it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a random file from your computer - Name it something like "This-is-a-test-to-see-how-this-discord-bug-works" - Try to delete it.
